Get a table from a particular TidyTuesday year readme

Source: R/html.R
dot-tt_year_readme_table.Rd

Get a table from a particular TidyTuesday year readme

Usage

.tt_year_readme_table(year, table_number)

Arguments

year

The year of the desired README.

table_number

Which table on the page to load. I do not currently validate this, so errors might be confusing if you send in a number higher than the number of tables in that README.

Value

An xml node_set containing the body of the table.

On this page
